title: mechs vs minions german cards ?
body: I am interested in mechs vs minions. i read the german pdf-rules and there are the example playing cards in german languare. are the playing cards in the game also in german ? if not: can i buy the playing cards in german, or do you have a pdf translation from every cards in german ?

replies.body: A german version will be available for Wave 2, which is expected to ship in June/July of this year.
@riot catzpaw - thx for your answer, but is it a german game version, or german cards, or german downloads ? and when can i order it ?
Hi also das englisch ist wirklich nciht das problem =) da kommt man super mit klar sind auch sehr selbsterkl√§rende Bilder =)

According to what Kades said on BGG, a german version and/or a german upgrade to the english version are being worked on.

But, to be honest. If you can understand most of what's written here on the forums, you can probably play the english version.
